name: Paper Shakespeare RPG: Saga of the Five Kingdoms
detailed_description:
Once a paradise, the world of Arden has been transformed into a post-apocalyptic stick figure nightmare! Kingdoms that were peaceful are now at war with each other, country roads that used to be safe are now set upon by bandits! To make matters worse, people that were once themselves have woken up to a new transformed state: a human blacksmith may now be a dog, and roving groups of Faerie Dinosaurs stalk the land.

You have been called to gather a band of brave adventurers and.... well, figure this stuff out. Find out what's going on. Put a stop to it. Hopefully turn everything back 'round to normal. The usual brave adventurer stuff.



  • 10 party members, each with their own skill
  • Explore six regions of this newly screwed-up world
  • Storyline adapted from six of Shakespeare's weirdest plays
  • Combat system based on party builds

short_description: Explore a post-apocalyptic world wherein everything and everyone has been turned into a stick figure! Explore newly-formed empires, ride Unicorns, punch Werewolves, and solve the mysteries of the universe!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8 and above
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8 and above
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: x86 or compatible processor
  • Processor: Intel Celeron CPU 1000M 1.80GHz
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: x86 or compatible processor
  • Processor: Intel Celeron CPU 1000M 1.80GHz
